extension.name: Hoicoi Radio
extension.author: Jibon Lawrence Costa
extension.description:
Hoicoi Radio - a Joomla! CMS module. Add unlimited radion station & enjoy.

 

Just add your desire radio channel Address & station name

Every channel url & name must be separated by comma (,). You need to put channel name corresponding to it's url.

 

More information: hoicoimasti.com

field.name: cname
field.label: Radio Station Name
field.description: Enter the Name of the Stations' separated by comma (,) . You can put each name in each line.

field.name: curl
field.label: Radio Station Url
field.description: Enter the address of Station's corresponding to the station name separated by comma (,). You can put each url in each line

field.name: popup
field.label: Show Popup Link
field.description: If enable then this will generate one link by which clicking user can see player with station list in different window.

field.name: pwby
field.label: Show Powered By Link
field.description: If you Select No then please do some donation me.
